DOC.criteria: Signed write informed consent ; Male female subject 50 90 year age ; Diagnosis probable Alzheimer 's disease accord National Institute Neurological Disorders Stroke Alzheimer 's Disease Related Disorders Association ( NINCDS/ADRDA ) criteria ; A MiniMental State Examination ( MMSE ) score ≥10 ≤26 ; Global Clinical Dementia Rating ≥ 0.5 ; Mild moderate ( severe ) white matter hyperintensities brain MRI perform within three year screen ; Good enough hear visual function complete neuropsychological test Caregivers live patient spend 10 hour week patient ; Stable dose donepezil ( 5mg 10mg ) least 60 day ; If patient memantine , wash least 60 day ; Medications include anxiolytic , antipsychotic , hypnotic may take dose stable least two week History stroke within 6 month ; Previous diagnosis severe ( 80 % ) intracranial artery stenosis ; History heart failure , ischemic heart disease ( myocardial infarction , unstable angina , stable angina ) , hypertrophic cardiomyopathy , lifethreatening arrhythmia ; Previous history coronary artery bypass graft surgery ; Severe symptom orthostatic hypotension ( orthostatic syncope presyncope ) , especially patient take alphaadrenergic blocker ( Alfuzosin , Doxazosin , Naftopidil , Tamsulosin , Terazosin , Arotinolol , Carvedilol , Labetalol , Trazodone , typical atypical antipsychotic ) ; Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ; Proliferative diabetic retinopathy ; Severe hypotension ( blood pressure le 90/50mmHg ) severe hypertension ( blood pressure 170/100mmHg ) ; Hepatic dysfunction ( AST ALT three time upper normal limit ) renal dysfunction ( serum creatinine 2.5mg/dL ) ; Retinitis pigmentosa ; Previous history active peptic ulceration within one year screening ; Hematodyscrasia susceptible priapism include sickle cell anemia , multiple myeloma , leukemia , various bleed disorder ;
